name: Orbflux: Earth
text:
{1}, Discard Orbflux: Earth: Meditate (Put an orb counter on a Chi you control. If you don’t control one, first create a Chi enchantment token with "{1}, Sacrifice this: Copy target spell you control with mana value equal or less to the number of Orb counters on this. You may choose new targets for the copy.") 

Enchant Chi you control.

Enchanted Chi is a creature in addition to its other types and has base power and base toughness each equal to the number of orb counters on it.
